scripts.build: pnpm --filter @depot/cli start && node scripts/copy-data.ts && pnpm --filter @depot/web build
scripts.build:all: pnpm --filter @depot/core build && pnpm --filter @depot/cli build && pnpm --filter @depot/web build
scripts.start: pnpm --filter @depot/cli start && node scripts/copy-data.ts && pnpm --filter @depot/web start
scripts.format: pnpm --filter @depot/core format && pnpm --filter @depot/cli format && pnpm --filter @depot/web format
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter @depot/core lint && pnpm --filter @depot/cli lint && pnpm --filter @depot/web lint
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter @depot/core clean && pnpm --filter @depot/cli clean && pnpm --filter @depot/web clean && rimraf node_modules
